other_tests.changes_over_time: No new findings at repeat flexible sigmoidoscopy performed four months later.

other_tests.findings: Did not show pancreatic abnormality but indicated increased periportal and peripancreatic collateral blood flow and attenuated flow in the portal vein.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.findings: Normal portal vein; indicated a hooked appearance of the base of the celiac artery suggestive of compression.
